page.title: 12THE CULTOQUHEY HOUSE HOTEL
page.content: The Cultoquhey House Hotel, covering an area of approximately six and a half acres, is Gilmerton's sole hotel. The hotel is situated in very scenic surroundings and is only open during peak holiday periods. Seven pounds fifty pence is charged per person for one night bed and breakfast. Each room has a wash-hand basin and a parking area is supplied. Other services in the hotel include a putting green, a dance floor, a piano and outside tables for guests. The majority of the guests return annually for a holiday and come from Yorkshire, Australia and the U.S.A. During peak periods the hotel could have as many as forty customers in residence.
